name: Nomad (itch) (gmduncanidaho)
description:
It's up to you to save the Nomad after a major battle! The problem? The ship jumped into an asteroid field in a hasty getaway.

Created at TOJam 9, this is a demo of a game we will continue to develop, Feedback is appreciated!

Defend the ship from incoming asteroids while repairing the hull damage. Only when the ship is fully repaired can you make the next jump to safety.

This fully realized 3D environment incorporates Newtonian physics to navigate around the exterior of the ship. Fire a "Blaser" to blow up incoming asteroids. Repair the hull using the "almost patented" repair-o-matic-hull-6000!
